00023 #include <ICoCoTrioFieldUtil.h>
00024 // pour ajouter une dependance pour avoir le .o dans ICoCo
00025 #include <ICoCoField.h>
00026 #include <string.h>
00027 #include <iostream>
00028 #include <iomanip>

00030 using ICoCo::TrioField;
00031 
00032 
00033 // Ajoute 1 a 1 les valeurs du TrioField donnee en parametre a celles de this
00034 // Verifie la compatibilite des dimensionnements
00035 
00036 void ajoute_field(ICoCo::TrioField& a , const ICoCo::TrioField& OtherField)
00037 {
00038 
00039   bool compat=true;
00040   compat &= (a._type==OtherField._type);
00041   compat &= (a._mesh_dim==OtherField._mesh_dim);
00042   compat &= (a._space_dim==OtherField._space_dim);
00043   compat &= (a._nbnodes==OtherField._nbnodes);
00044   compat &= (a._nodes_per_elem==OtherField._nodes_per_elem);
00045   compat &= (a._nb_elems==OtherField._nb_elems);
00046   compat &= (a._itnumber==OtherField._itnumber);
00047   compat &= (a._time1==OtherField._time1);
00048   compat &= (a._time2==OtherField._time2);
00049   compat &= (a.nb_values()==OtherField.nb_values());
00050   compat &= (a._nb_field_components==OtherField._nb_field_components);
00051   if (!compat)
00052     throw 0;
00053 
00054   for (int i=0; i<a.nb_values()*a._nb_field_components; i++)
00055     a._field[i]+=OtherField._field[i];
00056 
00057 
00058 }
